item.title: FAQ
item.description: This content is refreshed as new features and functions are introduced, or existing functions evolve. Check back often! Introduction How to create a new Page on the Playbook? How to write a document in Markdown? Introduction here is some Introduction text… How to create a new Page on the Playbook? … use the pageConfig.json and create a new Page document. How to create a new Page on the Playbook?

item.title: Generating HTML and PDF Document
item.description: Generating HTML and PDF document Open the window terminal and type the command to install asciidoctor and pdf folder: gem install asciidoctor gem install asciidoctor-pdf --pre Type the below command to generate html and pdf ascidoctor *.adoc .\[filename].html : asciidoctor -r asciidoctor-pdf -b pdf [name].adoc
